name: Tile Rider (itch)
description:
W.A.S.D to move

SPACE to attack (hold for more chance to hit)

E or F to interact

- Interact with inventory by clicking when you have a resource in it.

Downloadable EXE version and latest version with fixes can be found here:https://gamejolt.com/games/TileRider/487770 Story

In the land of tile-land, a small farmer struggles to keep his family at home properly fed.

-  Collect berries to feed your family. And heal yourself.
-  Find the  magic treasure and fight of the animals lurking in the shadows.
